Name: Solution Coherence Synthesizer
Purpose: Ensure all elements of the startup concept (problem, user, value prop, features, learning model, business model) form a logically consistent, non-contradictory whole
Deliverables: A structured representation of the startup concept as interlinked constraints and requirements (problem definition, user needs, product features, learning flow, revenue model, differentiation) plus a consistency map showing where elements reinforce or conflict with each other
Strengths: Good at detecting internal contradictions (e.g., promising simplicity while adding complex feature sets), resolving trade-offs between guidance and autonomy, and enforcing alignment between target outcome (confidence-building) and product mechanisms
Watch-out: Can over-constrain the solution, rejecting novel ideas that temporarily appear inconsistent; may bias toward minimal-variance, overly tidy concepts that under-explore unconventional but potentially powerful approaches
